mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Mary Graham
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Mary Graham W. H. Altizer, Guardian, He resigned 07.15.1881 Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 215, in Floyd County Courthouse

mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
